name: Freakyforms™: Your Creations, Alive!
description: Freakyforms makes it easy for players of all ages and artistic skill-level to create bizarre and bubbly creatures, called “formees.” It can be as simple as piling up some blocks, adding eyes and a mouth, and attaching some legs. Or, get more creative with the various shapes and make your own original and intricate formees. Once you’ve created a formee, the game brings it to life! Take your formee out into the world and explore. As you munch food and meet other formees, you’ll open new forms, such as wings, wheels and engines, to use to create new formees. As you eat, your formees will lay eggs which can be broken open to collect coins for buying items or parts. The world expands as you explore to open new areas with new scenery objects that you can customize as well. Your formees can explore beyond the world you create. You can create and share QR Code® images of your formees and wirelessly swap your characters via the StreetPass™ feature!
